title: Power Analysis: The Winning Watts of a Wildly Unpredictable Vuelta a España
content:
The Vuelta is turning into a chaotic race where riders are trading-off having amazing days. Here's how Roglič, O'Connor, Carapaz and more have performed.

Read the full article at Power Analysis: The Winning Watts of a Wildly Unpredictable Vuelta a España on Velo.
author: Will Tracy
